response: twitter users have a right to protect their personal information regarding data privacy. it is important for twitter to have policies in place that ensure the safety and security of user's private information. users should be given clear instructions on how to change their settings and who can access their data. twitter must also work with other social media companies and governments to create a unified system of data protection. this will allow users to feel safe when using these platforms, as they will know that their personal information is protected.<|endoftext|>
